id: Chicken nugget empanizambos using banana picositas zambos
title: Chicken nugget empanizambos using banana picositas zambos
instructions: Step 1. Cut the chicken breasts into strips wide, now pass the strips through BBQ sauce.
Step 2. They must be well covered.
Step 3. Picositas banana zambos should be as crushed as possible.
Step 4. Cover the chicken pieces with crushed zambos.
Step 5. Heat the oil and fry each piece.
Step 6. Serve to taste BBQ sauce or bathe it again from the same sauce.
